summary.para: Contains classes that implement the document management functionality common for the ASP.NET Core Spreadsheet control.
Lists values specifying the auto-save mode.
Specifies the default auto-saving mode.
The auto-saving mode is explicitly set to “On” for the control.
Contains the Spreadsheet hibernation options.
Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.Office.HibernationOptions.AllDocumentsOnApplicationEnd

summary.para: Specifies whether all open documents should be hibernated on application end.

member.value: true, if all documents should be hibernated; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.Office.HibernationOptions.DocumentsDisposeTimeout

summary.para: Specifies how long hibernated documents are stored on the server before disposal.

member.value: An object that specifies the storage time for hibernated documents.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.Office.HibernationOptions.StoragePath

summary.para: Specifies a path to a server directory where to store hibernated documents.

member.value: A path to a server directory.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.Office.HibernationOptions.Timeout

summary.para: Specifies the idle timeout after which an open document is hibernated.

member.value: An object that specifies the idle timeout.

summary.para: Declares members to store session-states in a remote storage.

member.name: M:DevExpress.Web.Office.IOfficeStateStorageRemote.AddCheckedOut(System.String,System.String)

summary.para: Adds a state of a checked out session to the storage.

member.returns: true if a session state was successfully added to the storage; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:DevExpress.Web.Office.IOfficeStateStorageRemote.CheckIn(System.String,System.String,System.String)

summary.para: Checks in the session with the specified ID.

member.returns: true, if the session was successfully checked in; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:DevExpress.Web.Office.IOfficeStateStorageRemote.CheckOut(System.String,System.String@)

summary.para: Checks out the session with the specified ID.

member.param: The ID of a session to check out.
member.returns: true, if the session was successfully checked out; otherwise, false.

summary.para: Returns an ID of the specified document’s session.
Returns a value of the variable with the specified name.

member.name: M:DevExpress.Web.Office.IOfficeStateStorageRemote.HasWorkSessionId(System.String)

summary.para: Indicates whether the storage has a session with the specified ID.

member.returns: true, if the provider stores a session with the specified ID; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:DevExpress.Web.Office.IOfficeStateStorageRemote.Remove(System.String)

summary.para: Removes a session with the specified ID.

member.param: The ID of a session to remove.

summary.para: Sets a value for the variable with the specified name.
Discards all changes to the session since the last call to the method.
